entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
